description: Provides integration of GNOME Shell and Pidgin Instant Messenger. In order to get notifications and in-line replies working, please install GNOME Shell Pidgin Extension by KageSenshi (https://github.com/kagesenshi/gnome-shell-extensions-pidgin), as integration provided by Pidgin Integration is currently limited to synchronization of status (selection made in GNOME Shell is mirrored to Pidgin and vice versa).
name: Pidgin Integration
